member.summary: Entity representing a refresh token in the system. - Refresh tokens are used to obtain new access tokens when the current one expires.

member.summary: The unique identifier of the refresh token.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.RefreshToken.Token
member.summary: The refresh token value.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.RefreshToken.ExpirationDate
member.summary: The expiration date of the refresh token.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.RefreshToken.UserId
member.summary: A foreign key to the user that the refresh token belongs to.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.RefreshToken.User
member.summary: A navigation property to the user that the refresh token belongs to.

member.name: T:Todo.Core.Entities.Task
member.summary: The entity that represents a task in the database.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for the task entity, the primary key, required, auto-generated, and a GUID (Globally Unique Identifier).

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.Name
member.summary: The name of the task, required, and a string with a maximum length of 100 characters. The minimum length is 1 character.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.Description
member.summary: The description of the task, a string with a maximum length of 500 characters. The description is optional and can be null.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.DueDate
member.summary: The due date of the task, optional, and can be null.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.IsCompleted
member.summary: The flag that indicates if the task is completed or not. The default value is false, and it is required.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.Priority
member.summary: The priority of the task, optional, and can be null.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.ListId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the task list that the task belongs to. The foreign key is required and can be null.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.Task.TaskList
member.summary: The navigation property to the task list that the task belongs to. The task list is optional and can be null. The property is not serialized in the JSON response. The property is not mapped to the database.

member.name: T:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList
member.summary: Represents a list of tasks that a user can create. A list can have many tasks. A list belongs to a user.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the list of tasks, autogenerated, and not null.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.Name
member.summary: The name of the list of tasks, required, and not null. The name must be between 1 and 100 characters.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.Description
member.summary: The description of the list of tasks, not required, and can be null. The description must not exceed 200 characters.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.Tasks
member.summary: The list of tasks that belong to the list of tasks, required, and not null. A list can have many tasks. The list of tasks is initialized as an empty list. The list of tasks is not lazy-loaded, and the tasks are eagerly-loaded. The list is not mapped to the database.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.UserId
member.summary: The user that the list of tasks belongs to, not required, and can be null. A list belongs to a user.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.TaskList.User
member.summary: The user that the list of tasks belongs to. This is a navigation property that links the list of tasks to the user. The user is not mapped to the database. The user is not being serialized.

member.name: T:Todo.Core.Entities.User
member.summary: Represents a user in the application with a unique Id, Email, and Password. A user has a first and last name, and a list of TaskLists. Inherits from IdentityUser, which provides the Id, Email, and Password properties.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.FirstName
member.summary: The first name of the user. Required, must be between 3 and 25 characters.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the user. Required, must be between 3 and 25 characters.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.Name
member.summary: The full name of the user. Computed property that returns the concatenation of the first and last name.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.Lists
member.summary: The list of TaskLists that the user has. A user can have multiple TaskLists. A TaskList can only belong to one user.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.RefreshTokenId
member.summary: The Id of the refresh token of the user. Used for refreshing the access token.

member.name: P:Todo.Core.Entities.User.RefreshToken
member.summary: The refresh token of the user. Used for refreshing the access token. A user can have only one refresh token. A refresh token can only belong to one user. This is a navigation property.

member.name: T:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository
member.summary: IAccountService interface is used to manage user operations like get user information, changing password, updating user information etc.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository.GetUserById(System.String)
member.summary: GetUserById method is used to get user by id.
member.param: The id of the user to get.
member.returns: Returns the user with the provided id.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository.GetUserByClaims(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: GetUserByClaims method is used to get user by claims.
member.param: ClaimsPrincipal instance that contains user's claims.
member.returns: Returns the user with the provided claims.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository.ChangePassword(Todo.Core.DTOs.AccountDTOs.ChangePasswordDto)
member.summary: ChangePassword method is used to change user's password.
member.param: ChangePasswordDto instance that contains user's id, current password and new password.
member.returns: Returns true if password changed successfully.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository.UpdateUserInfo(Todo.Core.DTOs.AccountDTOs.UpdateUserInfoDto)
member.summary: UpdateUserInfo method is used to update user's information like first name, last name, email, username, and phone number. It updates only the provided properties and keeps the others as they are if they are not provided (null or empty). It does not update the password, to update the password use ChangePassword method. And it does not update the user's id.
member.param: UpdateUserInfoDto instance that contains user's id and new information. New information can be new first name, new last name, new email, new username, and new phone number.
member.returns: Returns the updated user information.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IAccountRepository.DeleteAccount(System.String)
member.summary: DeleteAccount method is used to delete the user account by id.
member.param: The id of the user to delete the account.
member.returns: Returns true if the account deleted successfully.

member.name: T:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IRepository`3
member.summary: Interface for the repository pattern. This interface is used to define the methods that will be implemented in the repository classes. The repository pattern is used to separate the logic that retrieves the data from the database from the business logic.
member.typeparam: This entity will be the model that will be used to interact with the database.
This DTO will be used to validate the data that will be added to the database.
This DTO will be used to validate the data that will be updated in the database.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IRepository`3.GetAllAsync(System.String)
member.summary: This method will return all the entities from the database.
member.param: This parameter will be used to filter the entities by a specific id.
member.returns: A Task that will return an IEnumerable of TEntity.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IRepository`3.GetByIdAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: This method will return a specific entity from the database based on the id.
member.param: This parameter will be used to filter the entity by a specific id.
member.returns: A Task that will return a TEntity.

member.name: M:Todo.Core.Interfaces.IRepository`3.AddAsync(`1)
